title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: I thought Riot was saving URF for Christmas to surprise us....I'm exhausted {{summoner:3}}

I miss URF too... Wish they brought URF back and not the All Random version though, that one SUCKED. I MUCH prefer picking a champ I can get boxes and key frags with than depend on a lottery. I'll play ARAM if I wanted that.
Yay I liek URF alot too I thought they gonna give us a surprise in Christmas :(  Riot plz just bring back URF for surprise plz which is also a gift that Riot give it to us at Christmas.
Feels bad man. 3 times poor king. Hey, riot, are you trying to make us have snowball fights for the entire Christmas?!
Are your saying you DON'T want to hit people in the face by throwing {{summoner:31}} s? Or KILL them by throwing {{summoner:31}} s? I say three weeks of Death by Poro will be fun!
I think having abilities up every 0.3 to 3 seconds would be more fun :)
It feels like you only give us poro king... Give us some good gamemodes like nemesis pick or urf... And plz stop spamming us with poro king lol.
The amount of times we've gotten Poro King has really made me sick of Poro King.
This shows the 6th 7th and 8th time it has shown up in the RGM rotation.
How much do you all want to bet the next modes after poro king is either Hexakill or ascension?
Ascension for 5 weeks in a row.  Hexakill for 7.
Wouldn't Hexakill be for 6 weeks ;P

Odds are it will be Hexakill since it hasn't shown up for the longest out of the main 4 game modes, and it has the least amount of times shown up as well.

Ascension : 7
Poroking : 8 (6th through 8th hasn't happened yet, but is forecasted to show up)
URF : 12
Hexakill : 5
One For All : 6

I forgot to update urf to say 2 instead of what I have in my record that will go through and say 1234567 because I just want to enter the number, instead of keep updating the count, and I cant edit the post this is response to.
I just love how the ENTIRE comment section of EVERY SINGLE game rotation post is people saying "we want URF" like jesus christ, there's reasons they can't give us URF every week

Out of 39 weeks we have gotten URF only 2 times, back when it was only Friday afternoon till Monday 1-6 AM. We got a red headed step child called ARURF 1 time.

Now if we compare that to every other game mode, listed in order of the first time it has appeared...
Ascension : 7
Poroking : 8
URF : 2
Hexakill : 5
One For All : 6
DND : 3
Siege : 4
Nemesis : 1
ARURF : 1
Doombots : 2
Then why the hell can they give us poro king every week? Barely anyone even plays and/or likes poro king but we get it 2-3 weeks in a row rather often.

posted a long time ago, but the most recent posting from L4T3NCY (the person who is running RGM as far as I can tell) reguarding the popularity of the game modes was something along the lines that Poroking was the most popular game mode.
do you not find it annoying tho, that every time you scroll down the comments of a RGM post, all you see is WE WANT URF

As someone who wants URF, but is typically a lurker and I know that crying isn't going to help any (as it shows with the lack of it happening...), I just read the boards and give information about what could be one of riots coolest features, but instead has turned into game modes that are typically just group and zerg.

But to answer your question, I don't find it annoying because I agree with them. 5 days vs 14 days. I would rather have had the 14 days then have my hope shattered every weekend for the past... 32 weeks (8ish months) (the last time we had actual URF, not ARURF)
its by far not the most popular, its by far the most "PICKED" which needs to be corrected....
Well Riot held up their end of the bargain. We only got urf the allotted 2 times they promised
That feel when a company is scummy enough to use "at least twice" as only 2 times.
They said "no more than twice", and they kind of gave us a third with ARURF, if you want to count that.

No they didn't. They specifically said "at least twice." that means it won't be less than twice, but chance to get more than twice. And it would be fine if it only ended up being twice if other modes were around that number.

I don't like to complain about the rotating game mode, and I understand that riot is doing poro king for the Christmas season, but I feel like 3 times in a row of what people think is the worst mode is a bit excessive.

It's now 4 times in a row. How far will they go ?
